english: Fee Standards for Electronic Records Technical Service at the National Archives Administration, National Development Council
title: 國家發展委員會檔案管理局電子檔案技術服務收費標準

articles.content: The schedule is prescribed in accordance with Article 10 of the Charges and Fees Act.

The National Archives Administration, National Development Council (hereinafter referred to as NAA) provides technical services, such as electronic records (or files) migration (or conversion), media destruction and so on, and these service charges are listed in Attached Table One. The relevant directions for applications are enacted by NAA separately.

The fees for the enlisted services of the preceding article shall be charged in accordance with the schedule. Applicants who apply for expedited service shall pay an extra charge (as Attached Table One).
The schedule for the provision of optional services other than those of Article 2 is listed in Attached Table Two.

The fee for media which is damaged in the process of migration (or conversion) shall be charged in accordance with completion percentage. But those found before conducting migration (or conversion) are not subject to this restriction.
The schedule is handled in accordance with relevant provisions of the Charges and Fees Act, and review shall be made at least once every three years.
The schedule shall be come into effect as the date of promulgation.
